subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[corrupt]]; to [[ruin]]
# {{†}} [[dark]] [[spot]]s on [[crop]]s after getting [[wet]] in the [[rain]]
# {{†}} black
# {{lb|zh|Xiamen|Zhangzhou|Taiwan Min Nan}} [[bad]]; not [[good]]; [[disappointing]]; of [[poor]] [[quality]]
#: {{zh-x|心{sim} 情{chêng} 䆀{bái}|MN}}
# {{lb|zh|Xiamen|Zhangzhou|_|Min Nan|euphemistic}} to [[die]] (usually of children; also of adults in Zhangzhou)
# {{lb|zh|Hokkien|of fire}} [[slow]]; [[small]]
# {{lb|zh|Taiwan Min Nan|Teochew}} [[ugly]]
